TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void VTCompressionSession.VTCompressionOutputCallback(IntPtr sourceFrame, VTStatus status, VTEncodeInfoFlags flags, CMSampleBuffer buffer);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed VTCompressionSession/VTCompressionOutputCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Status code indicating if the operation was successful or not.
Contains information about the encoding operation.
Contains a pointer to the encoded buffer if successful and the frame was not dropped. A value of null indicates either an error, or that the frame was dropped.
Docs.summary: Handler prototype to be called for each compressed frame
Docs.remarks: The methods invoked as a result of calling will be invoked for each frame in decode order, not necessarily the display order.
